text:
InConversation | Software Engineer | Old Street, London, UK | ONSITE | https://www.inconversation.net

Stack: NodeJS, VueJS, Typescript, AWS, Docker, Terraform

We are a well-funded start-up building an audience conversation platform. Our technology makes two-way conversations possible at scale, and is used by brands, publishers and organisations to better engage with, understand and hear back from their audiences and constituents.

As one of our first technical hires, your input will help to create not only a great working environment but also the foundations for a competent engineering team.

Please contact me at joao@inconversation.net with any questions.
